title: What Fonts is this? (URGENT)
content:
"teach" and "But" can you help me what name of font is this?

Thank you and God bless

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142842/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")

author: roeljay222

comments.content:
The sans serif font is Sansation, a free font that until recently was a Google font:  
 [http://fontpro.com/sansation-font-16416](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142842/http:/fontpro.com/sansation-font-16416 "http://fontpro.com/sansation-font-16416")

The script font is another free Google font, Allura Script:  
 [http://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Allura](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317142842/http:/www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Allura "http://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Allura")
